value.title: Hyundai Motor Buys 80% of Robotics Firm Boston Dynamics
value.excerpt: Hyundai Motor Group agreed to buy a controlling stake in Boston Dynamics Inc. in a deal that values the mobile robot firm at $1.1 billion.

value.title: OctoML Announces Faster Machine Learning Model Inferencing on Apple’s New M1 Than Apple’s Core ML 4 Provides

value.title: New York City Council votes to prohibit businesses from using facial recognition without public notice
value.excerpt: New York City Council today passed a sweeping privacy law for commercial establishments that prohibits retailers and other businesses from using facial recognition or other biometric tracking without notice.

value.title: Watson Assistant improves intent detection accuracy, leads against AI vendors cited in published study

value.title: Boast.ai raises $23 million to help businesses nab government tax credits
value.excerpt: Boast.ai, which is developing a software platform to help companies obtain government innovation credits, raised $23 million.

value.title: Save the bees, save the world: How ApisProtect uses AI and IoT to protect hives
value.excerpt: Not be an alarmist, but if bees go extinct it’s likely that coffee would become a rare and expensive luxury commodity. And I don’t want to live in that world. Luckily, ApisProtect today announced its entry into the US market where it will provide its unique AI-powered hive monitoring system to beekeepers and farmers.

value.title: Smarter Cars: Auto Makers Experiment With Chips That Think Like Humans
value.excerpt: Experimental computer chips that try to mimic the way human brains work could accelerate the use of voice and gesture commands in cars, researchers say.

value.title: Adobe Is Making PDF Documents More Accessible To Screen Readers With New AI-Powered ‘Liquid Mode’

value.title: The new laws of robotics — building on Asimov's science fiction legacy in the age of AI
value.excerpt: Way back in 1942, science fiction writer Isaac Asimov created the Three Laws of Robotics. Now, an AI expert has expanded that list in a bid to ensure the robotics revolution works for humans, not against them.

value.title: How AI and machine learning moved forward in 2020

value.title: Customizing and reusing models generated by Amazon SageMaker Autopilot
